en.today: Mercury and Neptune form a dreamy alliance today, sweet ram, bending the rules of reality so your dreams can shine through. Passion and creativity will overpower obstacles, helping you see how capable you are. You'll also have more luck-charming peers and potential mates, so don't hide from what your heart desires. Stay cool this evening when the Leo Moon squares off with Venus, being mindful to keep your ego in check. Do something artistic to heal any wounds you've been carrying later tonight when Luna and Chiron align. Confidence-boosting mantras and having fun with friends will also do the soul good.

en.today: Your aura glows with increased brilliance today, dear Leo, thanks to a sweet connection between Mercury and Neptune. Use your voice and stand in the limelight to push your dreams further along. Connecting with your spirituality can also be very helpful for manifesting goals and receiving guidance. Meanwhile, the Moon moves through your sign, making it easier to follow your intuition and stand in your power. Recognize if you've been restricting yourself with imagined obstacles while Luna and Venus square off. Seek healing from your higher power when Chiron activates later tonight, smoothing out any rough edges you've been battling.

en.today: Bring imagination to your home as Mercury and Neptune align, dear Taurus, filling your space with gentle and creative vibes. This cosmic climate is ideal for changing up your interior design or working on passion projects from your favorite room. Find quiet and allow yourself to dream fully, and new visions will come to light. Try not to get frustrated if loved ones crave your attention when the Leo Moon squares Venus this evening, taking a breather to connect with family and friends. You'll have opportunities to slip back into solitude once Luna and Chiron form a supportive trine tonight.

en.today: You'll have a gift for dissolving barriers and bringing people together, dear Gemini, thanks to a sweet alliance between Mercury and Neptune. Please do your part when it comes to building community. These vibes also encourage you to support local cultural events and small-owned businesses. Consider what you have to contribute to the bigger picture, allowing your creativity to run free. Recharge your social batteries with a bit of solitude and self-care when the Leo Moon squares Venus this evening. You should be feeling refreshed and ready to revisit the crowds once Luna aspects Chiron later tonight.
